x.merge(y.merge(x))

Logical operators in Python

Apr 3, 2019 â€¢ dc

This post is a work in progress. It serves mainly as a reference to be updated occasionally on Python. I may in the future update this to include the equivalents in Java.

OR (Inclusive) := |

True | True == True
False | True == True
True | False == True
False | False == False

OR (Exclusive) := ^

True ^ True == False
False ^ True == True
True ^ False == True
False ^ False == False

x.merge(y.merge(x))
